Name: ABL No. 6
Description: ABL No. 6 by A Beautiful Life Brands is a fragrance for women and men. "A fresh, pretty, and totally original fragrance, perfect for any season. Orchard fruits, pear and fig, blend beautifully with sweet honeysuckle, exotic osmanthus, and fragrant lilac. Deepened by a touch of sandalwood." - a note from the brand.

Name: Black Rose
Description: Black Rose by A Beautiful Life Brands is a fragrance for women. "A thoroughly modern unisex rose fragrance, sensual and sophisticated. Bulgarian rose is amplified and framed by hints of leather, amber, and musk. Black Rose is an enchanting way to rediscover the beauty and elegance of roses." - a note from the brand.

Name: Composition by ABL
Description: Composition by ABL by A Beautiful Life Brands is a fragrance for women and men. "Back-to-school is a time bursting with expectation and new romantic possibility. Summer is over, its bittersweet kiss good-bye faintly lingers as you experience the promise that the changing seasons bring. Composition by ABL is an ode to that feeling of anticipation – a clean, modern, yet sensual accord for men and women. Notes of flinty graphite, bleached white paper, lush green apple, and soft grey woolens will come alive with the warmth of your skin, in a cozy sweater, on a chilly autumn day, as the leaves turn…" - a note from the brand.

Name: Crush'd
Description: Crush'd by A Beautiful Life Brands is a fragrance for women and men. "A warm, dreamy blend of Blood Orange, Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Ylang Ylang, and Sandalwood. Spicy and seductive, like a sexy creamsicle - this one's Shannon's fave!" - a note from the brand.

Name: Fawn
Description: Fawn by A Beautiful Life Brands is a Aromatic Green fragrance for women and men. "There’s something so magical about a walk in the woods; a craggy trail over twisted roots, mossy stones along a silvery brook, shafts of golden sun broken by the lush green boughs overhead. Then the trees part into a clearing, and in the tall grass of the meadow – a Fawn. Fawn by ABL is a fresh, green EDP with a toasty sweet finish. Notes of dandelion, lemongrass, and marshmallow combine to create something surprising and delightful." - a note from the brand.
